ShortDescription.Value: Taxi use can be disabled for the city.

Publish.LongDescription:
### Smart Traveler Helps reduce Taxi traffic by blocking taxi usage on the *rider (demand)* side.
### What it does - ✅ Prevents cims from choosing taxis by applying `IgnoreTaxi` - ✅ Un-sticks any cims already waiting for a taxi (taxi-lane + taxi-stand cases) so they re-route normally - ✅ Cancels dispatchable taxi requests so taxi dispatch/spawn activity drops over time - ✅ Optional: include/exclude **Commuters** and **Tourists**
### What to expect - Fewer taxi trips after a short settling period. - Existing taxis may still be visible briefly (finishing previous behavior), then traffic should decline.
### Safety / compatibility - Safe to remove anytime; works with new and existing cities. - Can be enabled/disabled in-game (turn off checkboxes [ ] to stop applying changes). - No Harmony or reflection-based patching; less likely to break on game patch day.
Tip: If you want to verify it’s working, enable “verbose taxi logging” temporarily and check the Status section in Options.
